channel.title: CVE Feed for M-Files -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for M-Files -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-41808|2024-08-04T03:22:24.302Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: In M-Files Server product with versions before 21.11.10775.0, enabling logging of Federated authentication to event log wrote sensitive information to log. Mitigating factors are logging is disabled by default.

item.title: CVE-2021-41807|2024-08-04T03:22:24.068Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: Lack of rate limiting in M-Files Server and M-Files Web products with versions before 21.12.10873.0 in certain type of user accounts allows unlimited amount of attempts and therefore makes brute-forcing login accounts easier.

item.title: CVE-2021-41809|2024-08-04T03:22:24.325Z -- m-files -- m-files%20server
item.description: SSRF vulnerability in M-Files Server products with versions before 22.1.11017.1, in a preview function allowed making queries from the server with certain document types referencing external entities.
